TheParasitized:CallOfParasites.NAME: 寄群之唤

TheParasitized:CallOfParasites.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 虫群在召唤。

TheParasitized:changbi.NAME: 长臂
TheParasitized:changbi.DESCRIPTION: 回合开始时, 获得 !M! 点力量。
TheParasitized:changbi.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 回合开始时, 获得 !M! 点力量。

TheParasitized:zhuxing.NAME: 蛛形
TheParasitized:zhuxing.DESCRIPTION: 回合结束时, 获得 !M! 点敏捷。
TheParasitized:zhuxing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 回合开始时, 获得 !M! 点敏捷。

TheParasitized:xiezeng.NAME: 协增

TheParasitized:xiezeng.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 回合开始时, 抽 !M! 张牌。

TheParasitized:duxing.NAME: 毒腥
TheParasitized:duxing.DESCRIPTION: 受到伤害时, 给予全体敌人 !M! 点虚弱和 !B! 点中毒。
TheParasitized:duxing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 受到伤害时, 给予全体敌人 !M! 点虚弱和 !B! 点中毒。

TheParasitized:huangmou.NAME: 黄眸

TheParasitized:huangmou.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 打出 !M! 张牌后, 全体敌人失去 !D! 点生命。

TheParasitized:jugu.NAME: 咀骨
TheParasitized:jugu.DESCRIPTION: 每当有一名敌人死亡, 获得 !M! 点能量
TheParasitized:jugu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 每当有一名敌人死亡, 获得 !M! 点能量

TheParasitized:pi_04_choice.NAME: 抉择
TheParasitized:pi_04_choice.DESCRIPTION: 回合开始时，抽 !M! 张牌，弃 !M! 张牌
TheParasitized:pi_04_choice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 回合开始时，抽 !M! 张牌，弃 !M! 张牌

TheParasitized:pi_06_purification.NAME: 净化
TheParasitized:pi_06_purification.DESCRIPTION: 消耗一张手牌获得 !E! , 若为诅咒牌, 则再次获得 !E!
TheParasitized:pi_06_purification.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 消耗一张手牌获得 !E! , 若为诅咒牌, 则再次获得 !E!

TheParasitized:pi_07_combo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 !M! 次

TheParasitized:pi_08_hunt.NAME: 追猎
TheParasitized:pi_08_hunt.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，若斩杀的怪物为精英怪，则升级你的所有诅咒牌
TheParasitized:pi_08_hunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，若斩杀的怪物为精英怪，则升级你的所有诅咒牌

TheParasitized:pi_10_parasiticTentacles.NAME: 寄染之触

TheParasitized:pi_10_parasiticTentacles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害, 恢复 !M! 生命, 你的手牌中每有诅咒便重复一次

TheParasitized:pi_11_callOfSwarm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 回合开始时, 升级你的所有手牌 !M! 次

TheParasitized:pi_12_deterioration.NAME: 堕天

TheParasitized:pi_14_nesting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 回合开始时，将 !M! 张生长加入手牌

TheParasitized:pi_15_whipping.NAME: 鞭笞

TheParasitized:pi_15_whipping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，抽 !M! 张牌

TheParasitized:pi_16_emergencyRepair.NAME: 紧急再生

TheParasitized:pi_16_emergencyRepair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 格挡，恢复 !M! 生命，将1张错误加入手牌

TheParasitized:pi_18_sacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 你可以打出诅咒牌，打出诅咒牌时，抽 !M! 张牌

TheParasitized:pi_21_pumping.NAME: 竭泽

TheParasitized:pi_21_pumping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌，当你打出3张牌后，回合将强制结束

TheParasitized:pi_24_deadlySlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 对全体敌人造成 !D! 点伤害并施加 !M! 点易伤

TheParasitized:pi_27_bloodShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 失去3点生命值，获得 !D! 点格挡2次

TheParasitized:pi_30_thornyFlesh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 受到攻击时, 攻击者获得 !M! 虚弱 !M! 中毒

TheParasitized:pi_32_witherAll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 给予所有敌人 !M! 层凋零
